description: You're just in time for Justin Grey! He's the right mix of sweet 'n' sexy, and he's here to show us what he can do.  So once Claude lets him get down to it, Justin pulls off those cumbersome clothes and fattens up that big, thick Johnson! And boy, is it a hall-of-famer.  Claude does his usual shifting around to capture Justin's whole essence. I love how Justin is sure to give us lots of engagement. His eye contact really cranks up the heat for this session and kept me transfixed the whole way through.Then we get Justin on his feet so we can see how he looks standing up. Claude gets down underneath the action to give us a look straight upward at this fine new recruit.  We also get one of my favorite perspectives, the one from Justin's point of view. He has a strong set of hands that know exactly how to please...himself, at least haha!  Claude moves behind Justin for a while to show us his cute, flinching ass. Yum, it's just the kind of rear end that needs a good, hard AD fucking!
title: Justin Grey
